chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
items.plainText: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

items.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
items.plainText: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

items.text: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
items.plainText: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

items.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
items.plainText: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

items.text: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
items.plainText: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

items.text: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
items.plainText: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
